member.name: TOKEN_ELEVATION_TYPE
member.summary: The TOKEN_ELEVATION_TYPE enumeration indicates the elevation type of token being queried by the function.

member.name: TOKEN_ELEVATION_TYPE.TokenElevationTypeDefault
member.summary: The token does not have a linked token.

member.name: TOKEN_ELEVATION_TYPE.TokenElevationTypeFull
member.summary: The token is an elevated token.

member.name: TOKEN_ELEVATION_TYPE.TokenElevationTypeLimited
member.summary: The token is a limited token.
